Summary: Lights over Illinois Shiloh, Lebanon, Belleville
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Belleville
There were no other sightings in Belleville on or around May 14th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I was driving east on west main and saw the triangle object it was a stealth blimp it made mo sound was black and had stars on the bottom side. I keep seeing the reports and had to write in. I would bet on this it mad no noise floated was huge and was not special. We have air bases in the are in Ilinois and Missouri so this one is not credible One of the witnesses used to live next to me and would bark at my dogs so he could call the cops and sit with a case or and stare into his porch light, please don't share this I don't want to be sued for slander Sorry I would bet my life on it, blimp, sorry to burst the bubble.
